languages.text: {n}Неожиданно какофонию вони в помещении заглушает острый, пронзительный запах озона и машинной смазки. Вы чувствуете, что тошнотворная атмосфера, царившая в зале, словно сгустилась в единое средоточие зла в глубинах корабля... и теперь стремительно приближается к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Неожиданно какофонию запахов в помещении заглушает один — вонь застоявшейся годами сырости и гнили. И следом за ним приходит голос, звучащий отовсюду и ниоткуда — пронзительный визг, похожий на звук пилы, вгрызающейся в плоть:{/n} "Хватит. Оставь мои игрушки в покое!"

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно какофонию вони в помещении заглушает острый, пронзительный запах озона и машинной смазки. Вы чувствуете, что тошнотворная атмосфера, царившая в зале, словно сгустилась в единое средоточие зла в глубинах корабля... и теперь стремительно приближается к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

{n}Suddenly, the cacophony of smells in the room is drowned out by a single new stench — that of years-old dampness and rot. It is followed by a voice that is coming from everywhere and from nowhere — a piercing shriek, like a saw biting into flesh.{/n} "Enough. Leave my toys alone!"

{n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

{n}Suddenly, the cacophony of stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. It is followed by a voice that is coming from everywhere and from nowhere — a piercing shriek, like a saw biting into flesh.{/n} "Enough. Leave my toys alone!"

{n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. It is followed by a voice that is coming from everywhere and from nowhere — a piercing shriek, like a saw biting into flesh.{/n} "Enough. Leave my toys alone!"

{n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

{n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，房间里的各种臭味被臭氧与油脂的刺鼻味道吞没了。你感到房间里令人作呕的气息在舰船深处凝固成了一个邪恶的奇点……此刻，那个奇点朝你冲了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，房间里的各种臭味被臭氧与油脂的刺鼻味道吞没了。伴随着这股气味，某个不知从何处传来的声音响了起来。这刺耳的尖叫声，就仿佛用锯子在锯肉一样。{/n}“够了，离我的玩具远点！”

languages.text: {n}De pronto, la mezcla de hedores de la sala queda ahogada por el penetrante olor del ozono y la grasa. Sientes que la nauseabunda atmósfera que impregnaba la sala se ha condensado en un solo punto de maldad en las profundidades de la nave... y ahora se abalanza hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, la mezcla de hedores de la habitación se ve ahogada por el olor agudo y penetrante a grasa y ozono. Este es seguido de una voz que procede, al mismo tiempo, de todas partes y de ninguna; un grito perforante, como una cuchilla que se hunde en la carne.{/n} «Basta. ¡Deja en paz a mis juguetes!».

languages.text: {n}突然、部屋の中で混じり合った悪臭が、オゾンと油脂の鋭く突き刺すような臭いにかき消される。あなたは部屋の中に蔓延していた吐き気を催す空気が、船の奥底の邪悪な一点に凝縮され…今、自分に向かって突進してこようとしているのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、部屋の中で混じり合った悪臭が、オゾンと油脂の鋭く突き刺すような臭いにかき消される。あなたは部屋の中に蔓延していた吐き気を催す空気が、船の奥底の邪悪な一点に凝縮され…今、自分に向かって突進してこようとしているのを感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich wird der allgemeine Gestank im Raum von dem scharfen, beißenden Geruch von Ozon und Schmierfett überdeckt. Du spürst, dass sich die widerliche Atmosphäre, die den Raum beherrscht hatte, zu einem bösen Punkt in den Tiefen des Schiffs verdichtet hat ... und nun auf dich zukommt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich wird der allgemeine Gestank im Raum von dem scharfen, beißenden Geruch von Ozon und Schmierfett überdeckt. Es folgt eine Stimme, die von überall und nirgends zu kommen scheint – ein durchdringendes Kreischen, wie eine Säge, die in Fleisch beißt.{/n} "Genug! Lasst meine Spielsachen in Ruhe!"

languages.text: {n}La puanteur diffuse de la pièce est soudain couverte par une odeur âpre d'ozone et de graisse. Vous sentez que l'atmosphère nauséabonde qui imprégnait les lieux s'est concentrée en un point précis des entrailles du vaisseau... et que cette manifestation impie fonce à présent sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La puanteur diffuse de la pièce est soudainement couverte par une odeur âpre d'ozone et de graisse. Puis une voix pareille au crissement d'une scie mordant la chair s'élève de partout et nulle part à la fois.{/n} « Assez. Laissez mes jouets tranquille ! »

languages.text: {n}Ozon ve yağdan oluşan keskin bir koku, bir anda odadaki karmaşık ufuneti bastırıyor. Odayı bürüyen baş döndürücü havanın, geminin derinliklerinde tek bir melanette toplandığını... Hızla sana doğru geldiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the mingled stench in the room is drowned out by the sharp, piercing smell of ozone and grease. You sense that the nauseating atmosphere that prevailed in the room has condensed into a single point of evil in the depths of the ship... and is now hurtling toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Odadaki karmaşık ufuneti bir anda ozon ve yağdan oluşan keskin bir koku bastırıyor. Odayı bürüyen baş döndüren atmosferin, geminin derinliklerinde tek bir noktaya toplandığını ve... Hızla sana doğru geldiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
